titles.title: A bill to authorize the extension of nondiscriminatory treatment (normal trade relations treatment) to the products of Moldova.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S739)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
2/6/2008--Introduced.
Authorizes the President to extend nondiscriminatory treatment (normal trade relations treatment) to the products of Moldova.
